content: this adult sized slouchy stripe crochet cardigan simple and quick to make it s lightweight for layering through all four seasons and the oversized fit is worked right into the pattern for you no need to guess at how to make it fit like mine pattern includes sizes xs-3xl womens this is an intermediate level crochet pattern but is very doable for an enthusiastic beginner and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet chain stitch and slip_stitch
